plot: It is hard for Nhat to say he is not coming after several years away from home.
title: Mama, I'm Not Coming Back Home
plot_es: It is hard for Nhat to say he is not coming after several years away from home.
original_name: Mama, I'm Not Coming Back Home
plot_en: It is hard for Nhat to say he is not coming after several years away from home.
